name: The Visit (Peanut Panda)
description:
It has been ages since you have last heard of them. They stopped responding to your calls and letters.

Maybe you are worrying too much. Yet something doesn't feel right ...

You decide to stop waiting. You pack your bags and begin the long trip to the mansion.

Entry to the Halloween libGDX Game Jam  2019. 

Ambient music by Devynn LaShure, Echo Blue Music

Interior backgrounds by  https://crazy-duck-games.itch.io/
